document.heading: Ward 4 Neighborhood Investment Fund Boundary Expansion Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-305, the “Ward 4 Neighborhood Investment Fund Boundary Expansion Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-779 which was referred to the Committee of Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 7, 2008, and December 2, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 16, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-605 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-305 became effective on March 20, 2009.
